item.title: Add prefect flow visualizations into a Sphinx project
item.description: This article demonstrates an easy way (hopefully) to add your prefect flow visualizations into your sphinx documentation using the sphinxcontrib-prefectviz plugin. Some context Let’s say that you have implemented some pipelines using the lovely Prefect, great news so far, you chose a great tool to automate the boring stuff. Now it’s time to document your flows, a simple way to have an overview of your flows is to use the flow visualization.
